name: An End of Tarred Twine
description:
An End of Tarred Twine is a randomly generated Twine hypertext version of Moby Dick. It's interactive and nonlinear and serendipitously fun. But good luck following the story!

I created this Twine version of Moby Dick for National Novel Generation Month (NaNoGenMo) 2019. Features:

  • 250,051 words
  • 2,463 passages (or nodes)
  • 6,476 links between the passages
